description:
Fix 2 issues with incognito extensions on linux:
- Drag and drop of browser actions wouldn't work properly from an incognito
window.
- Installing an extension from an incognito window raised a DCHECK.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=41764

messages.text:
lgtm

http://codereview.chromium.org/983004/diff/1/3
File chrome/browser/gtk/extension_installed_bubble_gtk.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/983004/diff/1/3#newcode97
chrome/browser/gtk/extension_installed_bubble_gtk.cc:97: // If the widget is not visible then it could be an incognito window.
I think I know what you mean, but can you clarify this comment. What could be an incognito window?

http://codereview.chromium.org/983004/diff/1/3#newcode98
chrome/browser/gtk/extension_installed_bubble_gtk.cc:98: if (!reference_widget || !GTK_WIDGET_VISIBLE(reference_widget)) {
why not just comment here that reference_widget could be null because it was installed into an incognito window (that's the case your talking about here, right?).
